file.upload: Upload file by clicking here or dragging file | Upload files by clicking here or dragging files

table.tooManyData: The table is optimized for ~100,000 rows of data. A higher number of data may cause issues.
table.nonSearchableColumnsInfo: For filtering other columns, please use the table filter
table.layoutStateAtLeastOneEntityToSave: To save, you must select at least 1 thing to save
table.noFilters: Add filters by clicking on the filter icons in table columns
table.limitRowsReachedTooltip: You reached the pagination limit - to see additional data, either change filtering criteria or request data export using report system
table.columnFiltersHint: Filters that were created via column filtering
table.autoSaveLayoutExplain: Any change to the table options (filtering, sorting,...) is saved and will be applied when you access the table next time
table.autoFitColumnsExplain: When accessing the table, the columns' widths will be adjusted based on the content
table.autoJustifyColumnsExplain: When accessing the table, the columns' widths will be justified -> the widths will be the same.
table.autoStretchColumnsExplain: When accessing the table, the columns' widths will be adjusted based on the content AND the container width, while stretching the columns at least to the container's width
table.autoJustifyColumnsExplain2: Note: There are special cases when the column width will be auto-adjusted based on internally predefined values
table.autoFitColumnsWithHeader: Auto-fit columns with consideration for the header width
table.autoFitColumnsWithHeaderExplain: Similar to the "Auto-fit" option, but the header's width is also considered
